Plot: Doc needs Marty's help again, but it's not your average walk in Hill Valley's park. With all original voices back this fun point and click adventure follows Marty into time traveling ...
Title: Back to the Future: The Game - 30th Anniversary Edition
Writer: Bob Gale (characters), Bob Gale (story consultant), Andy Hartzell, Michael Stemmle, J.D. Straw, Robert Zemeckis (characters)
Director: Dave Grossman, Dennis Lenart, Eric Parsons, Peter Tsaykel
